system.description: Effect: The user recovers HP equal to 1/4 their Max HP. If there is at least one allied Bug-typed creature on the field this healing is increased by 1/4 for each allied Bug-typed creature. Healing cannot exceed 100% Max HP

actions.name: Heal Order
actions.description: Effect: The user recovers HP equal to 1/4 their Max HP. If there is at least one allied Bug-typed creature on the field this healing is increased by 1/4 for each allied Bug-typed creature. Healing cannot exceed 100% Max HP
